org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.normalizer

Class RegionNormalizerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.normalizer.RegionNormalizerManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationObserver, PropagatingConfigurationObserver

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class RegionNormalizerManager
extends Object
implements PropagatingConfigurationObserver
    This class encapsulates the details of the RegionNormalizer subsystem.

        Call-back for the case where plan couldn't be executed due to constraint violation, such as namespace quota.
        Parameters:

      • getSkippedCount

        public long getSkippedCount(NormalizationPlan.PlanType type)
        Retrieve a count of the number of times plans of type type were submitted but skipped.
        Parameters:
        type - type of plan for which skipped count is to be returned

      • getSplitPlanCount

        Return the number of times a SplitNormalizationPlan has been submitted.

      • normalizeRegions

        public boolean normalizeRegions(List<TableName> tables,
                                boolean isHighPriority)
        Submit tables for normalization.
        Parameters:
        tables - a list of tables to submit.
        isHighPriority - true when these requested tables should skip to the front of the queue.
        Returns:
        true when work was queued, false otherwise.
